overview: Long seen as a potential threat to American security, the Islamic Republic of Iran has become an even greater concern since the tragic events of Sept. 11, 2001. This program explores the current situation in Iran and assesses what danger it poses. After a decline in power, Iran has caught the attention of the world's superpowers by developing its nuclear capabilities and making bold threats. But what risks are real and which merely rhetoric?
tagline: A fascinating look at the military tradition of Iran, its recent decline in power and its current struggle to gain a place among the world's superpowers.
title: Iran: The Next Iraq?
